item.title: Video creation/shooting - Upwork
item.description:
Title: Videographer/Video Creator Wanted for Short-Term Rental Promotion

Role: We're seeking a talented and creative videographer/video creator to help us promote our short-term rental property on social media platforms like Instagram Reels and TikTok. The goal is to create visually appealing and engaging videos that will drive organic traffic and increase bookings.

Responsibilities:

- Conceptualize and produce high-quality, eye-catching videos showcasing the property's unique features, amenities, and surroundings.
- Develop creative concepts and storylines that align with the property's brand and target audience.
- Shoot, edit, and post visually stunning Reels and TikTok videos on a regular basis, following best practices for each platform.
- Collaborate with the marketing team to ensure consistency with the overall marketing strategy and branding guidelines.
- Stay up-to-date with the latest trends, algorithms, and best practices for Reels and TikTok to maximize engagement and reach.
- Analyze video performance metrics and provide insights for optimization and improvement.

Requirements:

- Proven experience in videography, video editing, and social media content creation, with a strong portfolio showcasing your work.
- Excellent storytelling and creative skills, with the ability to capture the essence of the property in a visually compelling manner.
- Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro) and familiarity with popular social media platforms and their video formats.
- Knowledge of video optimization techniques, including captioning, hashtags, and trending sounds/music.
- Strong understanding of social media algorithms and best practices for maximizing organic reach and engagement.
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
- Passion for travel, hospitality, and creating captivating visual content.

This is a freelance/contract position with the potential for long-term collaboration based on performance.

Please submit your resume, portfolio, and a brief cover letter highlighting your relevant experience and vision for promoting our short-term rental property.

Hourly Range: $40.00-$60.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 20:07 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Real Estate, Travel & Hospitality, Aerial Photography, Drone Videography, Video Production, Videography, Video Editing, Video Commercial, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Real Estate, Travel & Hospitality, Aerial Photography, Drone Videography, Video Production, Videography, Video Editing, Video Commercial, Video Post-Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Facebook Ads Motion/Video Creative Designer - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented designer to create captivating motion/video ads for our employee engagement app in Slack and Teams. The designer will be responsible for coming up with visually appealing concepts and transforming them into engaging Facebook Ads creative. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of Facebook Ads guidelines and be able to create ads that grab attention and drive conversions. As a designer, you should have experience in motion graphics and video editing, with a keen eye for detail and the ability to work efficiently. Join our team and help us take our advertising campaigns to the next level!

Skills needed:
- Proficient in graphic design software
- Experience in motion graphics and video editing
- Understanding of Facebook Ads guidelines
- Attention to detail
- Ability to work efficiently
- Creative mindset

Hourly Range: $20.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 20:01 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Video Commercial, Motion Graphics, Video Production
Skills: Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Video Commercial, Motion Graphics, Video Production
Country: United States

item.title: Experienced Video Editor for YouTube, TikTok, and Reels - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a skilled video editor to join my personal brand team and help create engaging content for YouTube, TikTok, and Instagram Reels. The ideal candidate will have experience in editing dynamic, high-quality videos, with a focus on tech and app development content.

Responsibilities:

- Edit weekly YouTube videos (8-12 minutes) and daily TikTok/Reels (30-60 seconds).
- Incorporate graphics, animations, and transitions to enhance video content.
- Ensure videos are optimized for each platform’s specifications.
- Work closely with me to maintain a consistent style and tone across all videos.
- Manage revisions based on feedback to achieve the desired final product.


Requirements:

- Proven experience in video editing, specifically for YouTube, TikTok, and Instagram Reels.
- Proficiency with video editing software (Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve, etc.).
- Strong understanding of current video trends and best practices for social media.
- Ability to work under tight deadlines and deliver high-quality work.
- Excellent communication skills and attention to detail.
- Portfolio showcasing previous video editing work, especially in tech or educational content.


Preferred:

- Familiarity with tech and app development content.
- Creative mindset with the ability to suggest new ideas and improvements.

How to Apply:

Please submit your portfolio along with a brief description of your experience and why you’re a good fit for this role. Include any relevant work samples, particularly those related to tech or app development. Also, include your pricing structure in your proposal.



Posted On: June 19, 2024 19:57 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Country: Portugal
click to apply

item.title: ⭐️ Highly Skilled Video Editor & Producer - Upwork
item.description:
We’re hiring a world-class Video Editor & Producer with a strong background in creating engaging video content including VSLs (Video Sales Letters), video ads, and YouTube videos. The ideal candidate should have experience in sales videos, VSLs, and creating ads for lead generation and sales, with an understanding of the psychology of sales and VSLs.

Job Description in Google Doc format: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1sXbzAq-NTF3L35Dkt3XdO3CeLMCYMYZ8cOG-B6W-N1A/edit?usp=sharing

This is a fully remote position with a flexible schedule. We care about meeting deadlines. We want to start as soon as possible. This is not a full-time position, but we expect a high level of commitment and quality in your work.

IMPORTANT: After applying and if you qualify for the next round, you will be asked to record and send us a short 2-minute Loom video introducing yourself and your past work. If you’re not able or willing to send us a short Loom video, please do not apply here. If we like what we see in your Loom video, you will also be invited to the final round, a 1:1 interview.
-------
About Qvida
-------
At Qvida, we help business owners and human transformation specialists, such as coaches, therapists, consultants, and nutritionists, grow their online businesses.

We offer low-dollar, mid-dollar, and high-dollar offers.
We post content on Instagram, Facebook, Ads, and inside our Qvida Community platform.

-------
Role Objective
-------
If hired, your primary objective will be to transform the footage into a captivating, engaging video experience by using b-rolls, music, effects, transitions, captions, etc for the different video types, dimensions, and channels.

Video types:
* Trailers for online courses, info products, community, and other product features.
* Video ads for Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube
* Short videos for Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube
* Video Sales Letters for online courses, info products, community, and other product features.

Video dimensions:
* 16:9 (Rectangle)
*1:1 (Square)
* 9:16 (Stories, reels)

-------
Measures Of Success
-------
If hired, the following KPIs will be the measures of your success:
* Quantity of weekly videos created for ads
* Quantity of monthly videos created for YouTube
* Quantity of monthly videos created for VSLs
* Quantity of monthly videos created for shorts (reels, TikTok, YT Shorts)

-------
Responsibilities
-------
* Create a minimum of 5 high-quality ads weekly using AI tools and other creative resources.
* Create a minimum of 6 high-quality shorts bi-weekly using AI tools and other creative resources.
* Produce compelling VSLs (Video Sales Letters) that convert.
* Develop engaging YouTube videos repurposing the content stored (Webclass, old courses, etc) that align with our brand and marketing strategies.
* Produce high-quality video content (trailers, demos) for our high-ticket programs.

-------
Required Professional Skills
-------
* Proven experience in creating engaging and high-converting video content for ads, VSLs, and YouTube
* Great understanding of visual persuasion principles and sales conversion mechanisms
* Proficiency in using AI tools for creating video content and ad creatives
* Ability to understand the psychology of sales and apply it to VSLs and video ads.

-------
Required Personal Traits
-------
We’re looking for candidates who possess the following personal traits and characteristics:
* Proactiveness
* Speed of execution
* Ownership
* Transparent communication
* Punctuality
* Responsiveness

-------
Screening Questions
-------
* Please write with YES, I CONFIRM to indicate that 1) you’ve read the entire job description, 2) you fully understand what will be expected of you if hired, and 3) you’re fully confident in your ability to be the person we're looking for.

* How many VSLs, Trailers, or demos have you produced by yourself? Be as specific, factual, and numeric as possible (e.g., over 50, at least 100, 100-200, around 100).

* How many video ads have you produced by yourself? Be as specific, factual, and numeric as possible (e.g., over 50, at least 100, 100-200, around 100).

* How many shorts have you produced by yourself? Be as specific, factual, and numeric as possible (e.g., over 50, at least 100, 100-200, around 100).

* Show us at least 5 examples of the best-performing video ads, video sales letters, or trailers you have produced.


Hourly Range: $10.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 19:51 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Testimonial Video, Video Commercial, AI-Generated Video, Concept Video, Short Video Ad, Social Media Video, Video Post-Editing, Video Editing, Video Production
Skills: Testimonial Video, Video Commercial, AI-Generated Video, Concept Video, Short Video Ad, Social Media Video, Video Post-Editing, Video Editing, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply

Hourly Range: $10.00-$40.00

item.title: Video Editor for Baseball Youtube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for video editor for a Baseball YouTube
channel who can produce 1-2 videos per week (videos of 8-12 minutes).

My goal is to emulate the editing styled used in this video
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fxTZituJUaY&ab_channel=BottomOfTheInning
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_rOOfqPT0C8&ab_channel=BallersUnite.

You will be provided:
Script with voiceover.

REQUIREMENT:
Source the videos yourself.
Ensure editing meets YouTube monetization requirements.

If you are interested, post "Baseball2024" in your message so we know you read the description.

Please provide sample work along with your application.

Thank you.

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 19, 2024 19:50 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: United States

item.title: Need people with a camera to film their phone and make 30 sec-2 min how-to tutorials - Upwork
item.description:
I need someone who can use another phone to film their phone with (no screen recording) or a camera to do short how-to tutorials on phone apps. Even better if you have a good mic and can do screen recording for the website versions of the apps, but your main focus will for now be tutorials on the phone.

For now, I have around 120 Pinterest videos I need filmed, so opportunity to make $90 (pay is $0.7 per video).

It is topics ranging from "How to Delete a Board on Pinterest" to "How to Add Tags on Pinterest Business Account", so difficulty can range, but they are mostly easy and quick tutorials.

I expect 5 videos a day as a minimum, and at least two months dedication to the project (unless I don't have more topics).

Clear English and good mic, minimal/no background noises.

Please upload/add a link to a sample video, so I know what to expect.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 19, 2024 19:49 UTC
Category: Personal Virtual Assistance
Skills:Video Production
Skills: Video Production
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: VIdeo Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Please do not contact me outside of UpWork. I will not speak to you or hire you.

I have a video to be edited TODAY. You don't have to be concerned with any sound or what I or the person is actually saying.

I want it to look like a teaser video, 30 seconds long, with some shots coming in from the side, other shots moving across the screen, a title, and some words. Make it look good. Make it look snazzy.

item.title: Looking for a short clip video editor - Upwork
item.description:
Hey guys, I'm looking for an editor who can make engaging clips like this:

https://www.instagram.com/reel/C3InkOSuhmZ/?igsh=dWxxaDNtNG9hem1u
https://www.instagram.com/reel/C4UFmsqNktn/?igsh=aGFhd2Z0c3d2eG4=

As you can see is pretty basic edit, but WELL DONE.
-On point b-rolls (no shitty and cheesy ones)
-Engaging zoom-in/out
-Highlights on the important words
-Easy to read captions
The clips are are all between 15 seconds - 45 seconds.

I pay $30 per clip.

12 guaranteed clips a month to start as you prove reliability.

Budget: $30

item.title: YouTube Video Editor Needed - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled YouTube video editor to join our team. As a video editor, you will be responsible for editing and enhancing our YouTube videos to ensure high-quality content that engages our audience. The ideal candidate must have a strong understanding of YouTube Policy, video editing techniques, and storytelling. We only provide script and Voice-over and the Editor must know how to edit videos by using movie clips.

Video Duration: 8-10 Minutes or 16-20 Minutes   

Share At least 3 samples of different niche videos.

Thank you.



Budget: $250
Posted On: June 19, 2024 19:26 UTC

We are looking for a skilled YouTube video editor to join our team. As a video editor, you will be responsible for editing and enhancing our YouTube videos to ensure high-quality content that engages our audience. The ideal candidate must have a strong understanding of YouTube Policy, video editing techniques, and storytelling. We only provide script and Voice-over and the Editor must know how to edit videos by using movie clips.

Video Duration: 8-10 Minutes or 16-20 Minutes   

Share At least 3 samples of different niche videos.

Thank you.

item.title: Short-Form Social Media Video Editing Expert Needed - Upwork
item.description:
We are in need of an expert video editor to create highly engaging short-form videos for IG Reels, TikTok, YT Shorts, FB Reels. Each finished video will be 30-90sec in length. Raw footage will be static/talking-head and so it will be critical for the editor to be able to transform these into engaging, dynamic videos. Editor will be expected to take raw, uncut video and:

-cut/edit raw footage to remove mistakes
-utilize pan/zoom/crop to increase interest and engagement
-insert captions and b-roll that is clean and highly relevant to the topic of the video
-identify/create Hooks to be used in the first 1-3 seconds of the video to increase viewer retention and engagement
-identify engaging segments from long-form videos (ie. podcasts) to create short-form content
-utilize our b-roll file to find relevant videos and imagery

We expect to post 2-3 short form videos per day and need an editor with the capacity to meet this criteria.

Thanks for your interest.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 19:18 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Explainer Video, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Explainer Video, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: True Crime Video Editor - ONLY Long term weekly projects. - Upwork
item.description:
We are actively hiring for an experienced Video editor to work with us on 12 months project.
We run a YouTube Channel and we need a passionate person experienced in creating YouTube videos.
(Please note these are  NOT AI GENERATED videos,  they are real world video compilations)

About the Project.
2-3 videos of 20 - 25 minutes per week for the rest of 2024.

Single Video Offer
$20 -$25 - this will gradually increase working together.

What's your role?
Straight forward, we will provide a video title script and voice over and you will find content from anywhere on the internet and put together an "original and engaging composition"  from your skillset.

About You!
- Quick turnaround.
- An editor taking DETAILS into account. (So important)
- Willing to work on a long term project because we want to maintain the same style of content.
- Familiar with YouTube Automation.
- Smart YouTube Video editor to beat copyrights.
- One that takes details serious.
- You have worked in a team on different time zones :)
- Ready to do a video sample of a given title.

NOTE: Please carefully, read the information above before you apply.

If you have the skills, experience  and passion most importantly required for this role, your welcome to our team.


Budget: $25
Posted On: June 19, 2024 19:13 UTC
Category: Visual Effects
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects

item.title: Wow us, please! We're expanding our roster of talented post-production artists. - Upwork
item.description:
We're currently making all types of ads and will expand on the styles and total volume produced.

We need more creative post-production talent on our freelance roster to do this.  

We're looking to fill these roles:

Video Editors
Colorists
Motion Graphics Designers
Visual Effects (VFX) Artists
Compositors
Animators (2D and 3D)
Title Designers
Story Editors
Content Creators
Graphic Designers

If you've got exciting content to share, please send it our way.

We're looking to be 'wowed! Are you the one?
